component

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • component.Component
      • component.ClickableComponent
        • component.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ClickableComponent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item.MudItem, Item.ScaffoldItem, Item.StoneItem

    public abstract class Item
extends ClickableComponent
    A class representing a collectible item which can be stored in the inventory. Upon spawning, the item will shoot off in a random direction. Items are collected upon mouse-over
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(SpriteSheet spriteSheet,
            int x,
            int y)
        Constructs a new Item with the given SpriteSheet, x, and y.
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet, - a SpriteSheet where each sprite is a frame in the Item's animation.
        x - the initial x coordinate of the Item
        y - the initial y coordinate of the Item
